pullRequest.title: Pass body to service
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixing issue  #4679 -> requestBody was not arriving at the Service layer

PR checklist

[X ] Read the contribution guidelines.
[ XX] If contributing template-only or documentation-only changes which will change sample output, build the project before.
[ X] Run the shell script(s) under ./bin/ (or Windows batch scripts under.\bin\windows) to update Petstore samples related to your fix. This is important, as CI jobs will verify all generator outputs of your HEAD commit, and these must match the expectations made by your contribution. You only need to run ./bin/{LANG}-petstore.sh, ./bin/openapi3/{LANG}-petstore.sh if updating the code or mustache templates for a language ({LANG}) (e.g. php, ruby, python, etc).
[X ] File the PR against the correct branch: master, 4.3.x, 5.0.x. Default: master.
 Copy the technical committee to review the pull request if your PR is targeting a particular programming language.

commit.message: Fixed a bug where request body names were not being transferred appropriately based on openapi definitions
Added changes made to output samples

nodes.bodyText: @YishTish thanks for the PR. I notice all the indentations are gone. Is that intentional?

commit.message: Added sample code generated after last change
